title: Connect & Share Medical History
description: Book a free consultation with us and upload medical reports. Our team reviews them with expert doctors to assess further diagnostics needed to arrive at a treatment plan.

title: Receive Expert Opinions
description: Get multiple opinions from top specialists, detailed cost estimates, and visa support documents tailored to your case.

title: Travel to India
description: Our team coordinates visa, travel, airport pickup, hospital admission, and offers multilingual care support throughout the stay.

title: Recover, Follow Up & Return Home Safely
description: After successful treatment, our team assists with recovery planning, virtual follow-ups, and ensures smooth return travel. We partner with your local hospitals to ensure continued support.
